txt.en: Arodor can be found in Barad Orhant in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should bring the dust to Arodor.
Dust of Morgul-sheen can be found in the Circle of Sorrow in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should gather dust of Morgul-sheen.

'Now that the most pressing task is dealt with, I can now continue to study the strange sorcery that envelops these lands.\n\n'I wish to learn more about the glow of the Dead City, the Morgul-sheen. Would you search the Circle of Sorrow for dust of the same colour as the Morgul-sheen? Perhaps a study of this dust will help us to learn more about the sorcery and the glow both.'
Arodor wishes to learn more about the Morgul-sheen, the strange glow of the Dead City.
Bring the dust to Arodor in Barad Orhant

'What fascinating dust you have given to me, [placeholder]. It is not unlike the dust that gathers upon the furniture of an abandoned house, but see how it glows.'

Arodor throws a small bit into the air.

'Look! It does not catch the slight breeze in here, but floats, as if it were bound by some other force! It may take time, but I will continue to study the Morgul-sheen. You have my word.'
